author: jasha
msg: RAVE-610 Add integration tests to the Apache Rave project

- migrated from https://github.com/jashaj/PortalTests with proper license headers and package names. Original contributions were done by me, Marlon Pierce and Mohammad Nour El-Din (all Apache committers)
- added separate goal to rave-project that invokes the integration tests (normal build skips these modules)
